page.title: 14MELSONBY-Farms & Farming
page.content: All the farms in this block are intensive {mixed arable }and although the {dairy herds} have all but {disappeared} under the {effects of {Common Market}policies, small numbers of{beef cattle}continue to be{reared.} {Sheep}are the{main livestock}but{pigs {and poultry }are reared in intensive purpose built units. { Wheat and barley}crops attract large subsidies at present, hence the large acreages grown, although with the {millions of tons} at present in {intervention storage} it seems likely that {other crops} may have to be considered for {subsidy} in order{to {reduce}the amount of grain grown. { Potatoes}are grown{under contract}for the {potato crisp manufacturers} who have a factory at Peterlee. Root crops of turnips and some sugar beet are grown plus oil seed rape break crop.
